title: hobo
name: properjs-hobo
description: A very small, modular DOM utility for modern web apps.

config.build_all: is eq not one next prev attr last first index parent filter detach append remove trigger prepend closest children removeAttr toggleClass

scripts.min: ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs dist/hobo.build.dist.js -c warnings=false -m -o dist/hobo.build.dist.min.js && uglifyjs dist/hobo.dist.js -c warnings=false -m -o dist/hobo.dist.min.js
scripts.postbuild: ./node_modules/.bin/webpack --progress --profile --display-modules --colors && rm -rf docs/* && npm run doc && npm run min
scripts.doc: jsdoc dist/hobo.build.dist.js -R README.md -P package.json -t node_modules/jsdoc-oblivion/template -c node_modules/jsdoc-oblivion/template/jsdoc.conf.json -d docs
